displayName.english: Without music, life would be a mistake
displayName.spanish: Sin música, la vida sería un error
displayName.german: Ohne Musik wäre das Leben ein Irrtum
displayName.french: Sans musique, la vie serait une erreur
displayName.brazilian: Sem a música, a vida seria um erro

description.english: Congratulations, you have overthrown La Cúpula. If at this point you don't know who said this sentence, it means that you haven't understood anything.
description.spanish: Enhorabuena, has derrocado a La Cúpula. Si a estas alturas no sabes quién dijo esta frase es que no has entendido nada.
description.german: Herzlichen Glückwunsch, du hast La Cúpula gestürzt. Wenn du bis jetzt nicht weißt, wer das hier gesagt hat, hast du wirklich nichts verstanden.
description.french: Félicitations, tu as renversé La Cúpula. Si tu ne sais pas qui a dit ça à ce stade, tu n'as rien compris.
description.brazilian: Parabéns, você derrubou La Cúpula. Se mesmo agora você não sabe de quem é essa frase, você não entendeu nada.

description.english: Mic Drop!
description.spanish: Márcate un 'mic drop'.
description.german: 'Droppe' das Mikrofon.
description.french: 'Drop' le micro.
description.brazilian: Faça um 'mic drop'!

displayName.english: The apple does not fall far from the tree
displayName.german: Wie der Vater, so der Sohn

description.english: Your sister was right about you.
description.spanish: Tu hermana no se equivaba contigo.
description.german: Deine Schwester hat sich in Bezug auf dich nicht geirrt.
description.french: Ta sœur n'avait pas tort à propos de toi.
description.brazilian: Sua irmã estava certa quanto a você.

displayName.english: The truth is on your hands
displayName.german: Die Wahrheit liegt in deiner Kraft
displayName.french: La vérité est dans ton pouvoir
displayName.spanish: La verdad está en tu poder
displayName.brazilian: A verdade está em seu poder

description.english: Now think everything you can do.
description.german: Jetzt denk darüber nach, was du alles mit ihr tun kannst.
description.french: Maintenant, pense à tout ce que tu pourrais faire avec elle.
description.spanish: Ahora piensa todo lo que puedes hacer con ella.
description.brazilian: Agora pense em tudo que você pode fazer com ela.

description.english: There's no turning back now. Finish them!
description.spanish: Ya no hay marcha atrás. ¡Acaba con ellos!
description.german: Es gibt kein Zurück. Schalte sie aus!
description.french: Il n'y a pas de retour en arrière possible. Achève-les!
description.brazilian: Agora não tem volta. Acabe com eles!

displayName.english: What you didn't know about Antro
displayName.german: Was du nicht von ANTRO wusstest
displayName.french: Ce que tu ne savais pas à propos d'ANTRO
displayName.spanish: Lo que no sabías de ANTRO
displayName.brazilian: O que você não sabia sobre ANTRO

description.english: To change the world, first you must face it.
description.german: Um die Welt zu ändern, musst du sie erst konfrontieren.
description.french: Pour changer le monde, tu dois d'abord le confronter.
description.spanish: Para poder cambiar el mundo, primero tienes que confrontarlo.
description.brazilian: Para mudar o mundo, é preciso confrontá-lo.

displayName.english: Now this looks like a job for me
displayName.spanish: Now this looks like a job for me
displayName.german: Now this looks like a job for me
displayName.french: Now this looks like a job for me
displayName.brazilian: Now this looks like a job for me

description.english: Maybe you are the one we were waiting for...
description.spanish: Puede que seas la persona que estabamos esperando...
description.german: Vielleicht bist du die Person, auf die wir gewartet haben...
description.french: Tu es peut-être la personne que nous attendions...
description.brazilian: Você pode ser quem estávamos esperando.

description.english: You'll soon understand the evil lurking in Antro.
description.german: Bald wirst du das Böse zu verstehen beginnen, das in ANTRO lauert.
description.french: Bientôt tu commenceras à comprendre le mal qui se cache dans ANTRO.
description.spanish: Pronto empezarás a comprender el mal que acecha en ANTRO.
description.brazilian: Logo você passará a entender o mal que habita em ANTRO.

description.english: Thanks to you, La Cúpula will only be a memory.
description.german: Dank dir ist La Cúpula bald nicht mehr, als eine böse Erinnerung.
description.french: Grâce à toi, La Cúpula ne sera plus qu'un mauvais souvenir.
description.spanish: Gracias a ti, la Cúpula será solo un mal recuerdo.
description.brazilian: Graças a você, La Cúpula será apenas uma má recordação.

description.english: La Cúpula won't be able to stop you.
description.spanish: La Cúpula no podrá contigo.
description.german: La Cúpula wird dich nicht aufhalten können.
description.french: La Cúpula ne pourra pas t'arrêter.
description.brazilian: La Cúpula não conseguirá te deter.

description.english: Remove every trace of La Cúpula.
description.german: Beseitige alle Spuren von La Cúpula.
description.french: Élimine toutes traces de La Cúpula.
description.spanish: Elimina cualquier rastro de la Cúpula
description.brazilian: Elimine todos os vestí­gios de La Cúpula.

description.english: The Revolution is inevitable. Tell them!
description.spanish: La revolución es inevitable. ¡Díselo!
description.german: Die Revolution ist unvermeidlich. Sag es ihnen!
description.french: La révolution est inévitable. Dis-leur!
description.brazilian: A revolução é inevitável. Diga a eles!

description.english: That's the Discordantes' beat.
description.spanish: Marca el ritmo de los Discordantes.
description.german: Bereite alles vor für die Discordantes.
description.french: Donne le rythme aux Discordantes.
description.brazilian: Dite o ritmo dos Discordantes.

description.english: If you find spray paint, Leave your tag!
description.spanish: Si encuentras un spray, ¡deja tu firma!
description.german: Wenn du eine Sprühdose findest, hinterlasse dein Zeichen!
description.french: Si tu trouves une bombe aérosol, laisse ta marque!
description.brazilian: Se você achar um spray, deixe a sua marca!

displayName.german: Ich wusste, du würdest es finden...
displayName.french: Je savais que tu le trouverais

description.english: A loved one's message.
description.spanish: Un mensaje de un ser querido.
description.german: Eine Nachricht eines geliebten Menschen.
description.french: Un message d'un bien-aimé.
description.brazilian: Uma mensagem de alguém querido.

description.english: Your passage will be noted. Learn all you can.
description.german: Deine Zeit hier wird nicht unbemerkt bleiben. Lerne alles, was du kannst.
description.french: Ton temps ici ne passera pas inaperçu. Apprends tout ce que tu peux.
description.spanish: Tu paso por aquí no pasará inadvertido. Aprende todo lo que puedas.
description.brazilian: Seu tempo aqui não passará despercebido. Aprenda tudo o que puder.

description.english: A delicious grasshopper bar will keep you satiated.
description.spanish: Una deliciosa barrita de chapulín te ayudará a reponer fuerzas.
description.german: Ein leckerer Grashopferriegel wird dir dabei helfen, Kraft zu tanken.
description.french: Une délicieuse barre de sauterelles t'aidera à reprendre des forces.
description.brazilian: Uma deliciosa barra de gafanhoto vai ajudar você a repor suas energias.

description.english: If you want to keep alive, you better know your enemy.
description.spanish: Si quieres permanecer vivo, te vendrá bien conocer a tu enemigo.
description.german: Wenn du am Leben bleiben willst, ist es besser deine Feinde zu kennen.
description.french: Si tu veux rester en vie, il vaut mieux connaître son ennemie.
description.brazilian: Se quiser sobreviver, é bom conhecer o seu inimigo.

description.english: Welcome to D1! Antro's dump.
description.spanish: ¡Bienvenido al D1! El estercolero de ANTRO.
description.german: Willkommen bei D1! ANTROs Kloake.
description.french: Bienvenue à D1! La fosse septique d'ANTRO.
description.brazilian: Bem-vindo ao D1, a latrina de ANTRO.

description.english: Preach Antro's Manifesto if you don't want to be wasted.
description.spanish: Entona el Manifiesto de ANTRO si no quieres acabar como un despojo.
description.german: Rezitiere das ANTRO-Manifest, wenn du nicht als Schrott enden willst.
description.french: Récite le Manifeste d'ANTRO si tu ne veux pas finir en morceaux.
description.brazilian: Recite o Manifesto de ANTRO se não quiser virar refugo.

displayName.english: Mom, when I'm older I wanna be an artist
displayName.spanish: Mamá: de mayor quiero ser artista
displayName.german: Mama: wenn ich groß bin, will ich Künstler werden
displayName.french: Maman: Quand je serai grand, je voudrais devenir un artiste
displayName.brazilian: Mamãe, quando eu crescer, quero ser artista

description.english: Welcome to D2! Antro's bohemian quarter.
description.spanish: ¡Bienvenido al D2! El barrio bohemio de ANTRO.
description.german: Willkommen bei D2! ANTROs Bohemien-Viertel.
description.french: Bienvenue à D2! Le quartier bohème d'ANTRO.
description.brazilian: Bem-vindo ao D2, o bairro boêmio de ANTRO.

description.english: You are one of us! We are the resistance, we are the Discordantes.
description.spanish: ¡Ya eres uno de los nuestros! Somos la resistencia, somos los Discordantes.
description.german: Du bist jetzt einer von uns. Wir sind der Widerstand, wir sind die Discordantes.
description.french: Tu es un des nôtres maintenant! Nous sommes la résistance, nous sommes les Discordants.
description.brazilian: Agora você é um dos nossos! Somos a resistência, somos os Discordantes.

description.english: La Cúpula invites you to celebrate Salvaguarda's Day.
description.spanish: La Cúpula te invita a celebrar el Dí­a de la Salvaguardia.
description.german: La Cúpula läd dich ein, den Tag des Schutzes zu feiern.
description.french: La Cúpula t'invite à célébrer la journée de la Protection.
description.brazilian: La Cúpula convida você a celebrar o Dia da Salvaguarda.

description.english: There's no better leisure than to live in another reality.
description.spanish: Nada mejor para evadirse que vivir otra realidad.
description.german: Um der Realität zu entfliehen, gibt es nichts besseres, als in einer anderen zu leben.
description.french: Rien de mieux pour s'échapper que de vivre une autre réalité.
description.brazilian: O melhor jeito de fugir da realidade é viver outra.

description.english: 1000 antrocredits to your pocket.
description.spanish: 1.000 antrocéditos para tu bolsillo.
description.german: 1.000 Antrocredits für deine Tasche.
description.french: 1.000 Antrocrédits pour ta poche.
description.brazilian: Consiga 1.000 Antrocréditos para o seu bolso.

displayName.french: La Cúpula pourvoit à nos besoins

description.english: You now know everything about La Cúpula.
description.spanish: Ya lo sabes todo sobre la Cúpula.
description.german: Jetzt weißt du alles über La Cúpula.
description.french: Maintenant tu sais tout de La Cúpula.
description.brazilian: Agora você sabe tudo sobre La Cúpula.

description.english: Welcome to D3! Antro's command center.
description.spanish: ¡Bienvenido al D3! El centro neurálgico de ANTRO.
description.german: Willkommen bei D3! Dem Nervenzentrum von ANTRO.
description.french: Bienvenue à D3! Le centre névralgique d'ANTRO.
description.brazilian: Bem-vindo ao D3, o centro nevrálgico de ANTRO.

description.english: You now know the best kept secret of Salva.
description.spanish: Ya conoces el secreto mejor guardado del Salva.
description.german: Du kennst das bestgehütete Geheimnis der Salva.
description.french: Tu connais maintenant le secret le mieux gardé de Salva.
description.brazilian: Agora você sabe o segredo mais bem guardado do Salva.

description.english: Pouring one out for the fallen!
description.spanish: ¡Un trago al suelo por los que se fueron!
description.german: Wir trinken auf die, die gegangen sind!
description.french: Une boisson versée à terre pour ceux qui sont partis!
description.brazilian: Um brinde àqueles que se foram!

description.english: Unity breeds distiction.
description.spanish: La unión es lo que crea a los distintos.
description.german: Einheit schafft das Besondere.
description.french: C'est l'unité qui crée la distinction.
description.brazilian: É na união que nos tornamos distintos.

description.english: Stealth is your hidden trick.
description.spanish: El arte del sigilo es tu granito de magia.
description.german: Die Kunst der Tarnung ist deine Magie.
description.french: L'art de la furtivité est un peu ta touche magique.
description.brazilian: A arte da furtividade é a sua pitada de mágica.

description.english: With courage and passion nothing's impossible.
description.spanish: Amb cor i valor no hi ha res impossible.
description.german: Mit Herz und Mut ist nichts unmöglich.
description.french: Avec le cœur et du courage, rien n'est impossible.
description.brazilian: Com coração e coragem, nada é impossí­vel.

description.english: Remember: life's a matter of perspective.
description.spanish: Recuerda: la vida es cuestión de perspectivas.
description.german: Denk dran: Das Leben ist eine Frage der Perspektive.
description.french: Souviens-toi : la vie est une question de perspectives.
description.brazilian: Lembre-se: tudo na vida é uma questão de perspectivas.

displayName.english: A los pies de la Cúpula
displayName.spanish: A los pies de la Cúpula
displayName.german: A los pies de la Cúpula
displayName.french: A los pies de la Cúpula
displayName.brazilian: A los pies de la Cúpula

description.english: Run! No matter what, keep moving forward and don't look back.
description.spanish: ¡Corre! Pase lo que pase, sigue adelante y no mires atrás.
description.german: Lauf! Egal was passiert, lauf weiter und schau nicht zurück.
description.french: Cours! Quoi qu'il arrive, continue et ne regarde pas en arrière.
description.brazilian: Corra! O que quer que aconteça, siga em frente e não olhe pra trás.

description.english: A blood Covenant. An Iron brotherhood.
description.german: Blut vereint uns. Bruderschaft aus Eisen.
description.french: Le sang nous unit. La confrérie du fer.
description.spanish: La sangre nos une. Hermandad de hierro.
description.brazilian: O sangue nos une. é a irmandade de ferro.
